MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  LL67  postcode area of Cemaes Bay, affecting properties in Maes Cynfor and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  8:18AM. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:30AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:50AM on 20th April 2021.
